nodes.text: Satrank was a male Godling, a member of the ruling sub-species of the Anointed People from the planet Masterhome who lived during the Galactic Civil War.

A male Godling, Satrank and others from his sub-species ruled over the Anointed People of Abonshee under the leadership of the Godking Trisstan. In 0 ABY, during the Galactic Civil War, the planet was visited by diplomats of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. In an attempt to test the Alliance's honesty and commitment to diplomacy, Satrank was assigned by Trstram to feign being an ambitious conspirator vying for the throne and approach the Rebels in an attempt to help overthrow the Godking. Satrank was to report their answer directly to Trisstan during the welcoming gala held out the royal palace, Masterhome.
